div.p: This is the FHIR Implementation Guide for Case Reporting containing the specifications developed by the OpenHIE community.

li.strong: This implementation guide and set of artifacts are still undergoing development.

ul.li: This content is only for demonstration purposes only.
Providing Feedback: Please submit any issues via the Feedback link next to the appropriate section of the implementation guide

div.p: There is a need for countries to centralize and report on data that is captured at the point of service systems to effectively measure and monitor the progression and outcome of the COVID19 pandemic by measuring and monitoring individuals diagnosed with the disease and their status towards being up-to-date vaccinated. The COVID19 immunisation status of Up-to-date Vaccinated refers to those clients who have been fully vaccinated (received all doses for the Primary Vaccine Series) and received all doses for the specified Booster Vaccine Series. This is a content specific FHIR IG that has been tailored to support the COVID19 Minimum Dataset (MDS).
